data.lyric:
[ti:Six Feet Apart]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:Six Feet Apart]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Six Feet Apart - Luke Combs
[00:04.97]Lyrics by：Luke Combs/Brent Cobb/Rob Snyder
[00:09.95]Composed by：Luke Combs/Brent Cobb/Rob Snyder
[00:14.92]When the dogwoods start to bloom
[00:17.93]And the crickets hum their tune
[00:20.54]It's usually about the time
[00:23.96]That I feel most alive
[00:26.36]
[00:27.06]But the news has all been bad
[00:30.09]And the world just seems so sad
[00:32.82]I ain't had much else going on
[00:36.02]So I sat down and wrote this song
[00:38.98]I miss my mom I miss my dad
[00:42.20]I miss the road I miss my band
[00:45.14]Giving hugs and shaking hands
[00:51.38]It's a mystery I suppose
[00:54.57]Just how long this thing goes
[00:57.29]There'll be crowds and there'll be shows
[01:01.31]
[01:01.84]And there will be light after dark
[01:05.50]Some day when we aren't six feet apart
[01:16.14]The first thing that I'm gonna do
[01:18.93]Slide on in some corner booth
[01:21.38]
[01:22.00]Take the whole d**n family out
[01:25.21]Buy my buddies all a round
[01:28.27]Pay some extra on the tab
[01:31.29]Catch a movie catch a cab
[01:34.27]Watch a ball game from the stands
[01:37.83]Probably over-wash my hands
[01:40.61]I miss my mom I miss my dad
[01:43.75]I miss the road I miss my band
[01:46.80]Giving hugs and shaking hands
[01:52.93]It's a mystery I suppose
[01:56.06]Just how long this thing goes
[01:58.98]There'll be crowds and there'll be shows
[02:03.39]And there will be light after dark
[02:07.08]Some day when we aren't six feet apart
[02:17.56]I miss my mom I miss my dad
[02:20.68]I miss the road I miss my band
[02:23.65]Giving hugs and shaking hands
[02:29.75]Now it's a mystery I suppose
[02:32.98]Just how long this thing goes
[02:35.68]There'll be crowds and there'll be shows
[02:39.82]
[02:40.34]And there will be light after dark
[02:44.05]Some day when we aren't six feet apart
[02:52.29]There will be light after dark
[02:56.24]Some day when we aren't six feet apart
data.trans:
[ti:Six Feet Apart]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:Six Feet Apart]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.97]//
[00:09.94]//
[00:14.92]当山茱萸开始绽放
[00:17.93]蟋蟀哼着它们的小曲
[00:20.54]这样悠然的时光
[00:23.96]总让我感觉更有活力
[00:26.36]
[00:27.06]而各种噩耗一如既往地接踵而至
[00:30.09]整个世界似乎都很悲凉
[00:32.82]我没有什么别的事要做
[00:36.02]所以我坐下写了这首歌
[00:38.98]我想念我的妈妈 我想念我的爸爸
[00:42.20]我想念熟悉的路 我想念我的乐队
[00:45.14]热切地拥抱 激动地握手
[00:51.38]我想无从得知
[00:54.57]这久违的会面要持续多久
[00:57.29]应是熙熙攘攘的人群 座无虚席的表演
[01:01.31]
[01:01.84]无尽的黑夜之后是慰人心弦的晨曦
[01:05.50]总有一天我们不必再保持安全距离
[01:16.14]那我要做的第一件事
[01:18.93]就是溜进街角的报亭
[01:21.38]
[01:22.00]带上一大家子人出去热闹
[01:25.21]给我的兄弟们各种买买买
[01:28.27]小费也额外多给些
[01:31.29]看场电影 搭个车
[01:34.27]痛痛快快地看场球赛
[01:37.83]估计那可得好好洗下手了
[01:40.61]我想念我的妈妈 我想念我的爸爸
[01:43.75]我想念熟悉的路 我想念我的乐队
[01:46.80]热切地拥抱 激动地握手
[01:52.93]我想无从得知
[01:56.06]这久违的会面要持续多久
[01:58.98]应是熙熙攘攘的人群 座无虚席的表演
[02:03.39]无尽的黑夜之后是慰人心弦的晨曦
[02:07.08]总有一天我们不必再保持安全距离
[02:17.56]我想念我的妈妈 我想念我的爸爸
[02:20.68]我想念熟悉的路 我想念我的乐队
[02:23.65]热切地拥抱 激动地握手
[02:29.75]现在 我想无从得知
[02:32.98]这久违的会面要持续多久
[02:35.68]应是熙熙攘攘的人群 座无虚席的表演
[02:39.82]
[02:40.34]无尽的黑夜之后是慰人心弦的晨曦
[02:44.05]总有一天我们不必再保持安全距离
[02:52.29]无尽的黑夜之后是慰人心弦的晨曦
[02:56.24]总有一天我们不必再保持安全距离
